entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • How to remove children when DeleteBehaviour is set to NoAction? #32596
  • ComplexProperty and OwnsMany/AutoInclude #32595

Closed

  • .NET Core CLI add migration command inconsistently using wrong DbContext constructor #27963
  • Add-migrations fails when order of constructors isn't correct #28004
  • Create an empty file migration in Illegal character filename in add-migration #24024
    9.0.0
  • ComplexProperty & ValueGenerator #32550
  • Custom IdGenerator is not being used #24120
  • Compiled model and SQLite in EF Core error #32592
  • EF Core does not report types it failed to load from migration assemblies #19691
    9.0.0
  • Update ApplyConfigurationsFromAssembly to call non-public constructors #24748
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Pass 'OBJECT' to sp_rename when renaming a table or sequence #32599
  • [release/8.0] Improve the relationship cycle breaking logic to detect cycles even when not starting on one. #32598
    Servicing-approved, 8.0.2
  • Update developer docs for building packages and using developer build config #32597

Merged

  • Fix relationship cycle breaking logic in CSharpRuntimeModelCodeGenerator. #32593
  • Fix some API docs #32594
  • Validate scaffolding migration file names #32589
  • Generate more information when failing to load EntityTypeConfiguration types #32577

Updated

  • [release/8.0] Ensure that, by convention, dependent properties have the same element type as principal properties #32582
    Servicing-approved, 8.0.2
  • [release/8.0] Fix splitting migrations SQL by GO #32572
    Servicing-approved, 8.0.2
  • [release/8.0] Make proxies thread-safe accessing a navigation once loaded #32547
    Servicing-approved, 8.0.2
  • [release/8.0] Fix Contains within SQL Server aggregate functions #32543
    Servicing-approved, 8.0.2
